author: felicity
msg: bug 3517: if both userstate_dir and user_dir were specified, user_dir would be used to derive userstate_dir even though it was explicitly specified.  the code will now use userstate_dir if defined, then derive from user_dir if possible, then revert to the system default if nothing else is available.
